bibliographic-data.invention-title: VIEWING SHOPPING INFORMATION ON A NETWORK BASED SOCIAL PLATFORM

abstract.p: A system for viewing shopping information on a social networking platform is disclosed. At the social networking platform, the system receives a request from a user device corresponding to a first user of the social networking platform to view a list of a second user of the social networking platform. The list may include items offered for transaction on a network-based commerce server. In response to receiving the request from the user device, the system forwards the request to the network-based commerce server, and then receives updated information for at least one item on the list from the network-based corner server. Then, the system communicates the updated information received from the network-based commerce server to the user device.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SHOPPING INFORMATION ON A NETWORK BASED SOCIAL PLATFORM

abstract.p: A system to view shopping information on a social networking platform. The system includes a network-based marketplace, a communication network and a network-based social platform. The network-based social platform comprises: a communication module to receive a request from a first user to view a list associated with a second user both on the network-based social platform, the list including items offered for sale on the network-based marketplace. The network-based social platform further comprises a database and a processing module. The processing module accesses user profile information that is stored on the database to determine whether the first user is authorized to view the list associated with the second user based on the user profile information.
Finally, the communication module communicates a user interface over the network, to the first user, the user interface to include at least one item from the list of items.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SHOPPING INFORMATION ON A NETWORK BASED SOCIAL PLATFORM
SHARING SHOPPING INFORMATION ON A NETWORK-BASED SOCIAL PLATFORM

abstract.p: A system that receives, at a network-based social platform, a request from a first user of the network-based social platform. The request is to add an item to a list associated with a second user of the network-based social platform. The list is for watching items offered for sale on a network-based marketplace. Next, the system determines whether the first user is authorized to add the item to the list associated with the second user based on relationship information that identifies a predetermined relationship between the first user and the second user on the network-based social platform. Finally, the system communicates the request to the network-based marketplace to add the item to the list associated with the second user.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SHARING SHOPPING INFORMATION ON A NETWORK-BASED SOCIAL PLATFORM

abstract.p: A system for sharing information on a networked-based social platform is provided. A request from a first user of the network-based social platform is received. The request is to add an item to a list associated with a second user of the network-based social platform. The list is for watching items associated with a network-based platform distinct from the network-based social platform. Next, the system determines whether the first user is authorized to add the item to the list associated with the second user based on relationship information that identifies a relationship between the first user and the second user on the network-based social platform. Finally, the system communicates the request to the network-based platform to add the item to the list associated with the second user.

abstract.p: A system for sharing information on a networked-based social platform is provided. A request from a first user of the network-based social platform is received. The request is to add an item to a list associated with a second user of the network-based social platform. The list is for watching items associated with a network-based platform distinct from the network-based social platform. Next, the system determines whether the first user is authorized to add the item to the list associated with the second user based on relationship information that identifies a relationship between the first user and the second user on the network-based social platform. nplcit.text: "Buy.com, Facebook team up to compete with eBay", (the A.P., Charleston Daily Mail, pp. 2-2c. Aug 7, 2007). Retrieved from Proquest 9/21/2012

abstract.p: A system and method for sharing information on a network-based social platform is provided. A search request, from a first user, for an item from a network-based marketplace is received via an interface provided by a social networking website of a network-based social platform. The network-based social platform is a platform that allows the first user to communicatively couple with at least a second user with whom the first user has a pre-established relationship that is stored in a user profile of the first user at the network-based social platform. A search result including at least one item available from the network-based marketplace is provided to the interface associated with the first user. A selection is received from the first user to share information concerning an item from the search result to at least the second user, and the information is shared with at least the second user.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SHARING INFORMATION ON A NETWORK-BASED SOCIAL PLATFORM

abstract.p: A system and method for sharing information on a network-based social platform is provided. A search request, from a first user, for an item from a network-based marketplace is received via an interface provided by a social networking website of a network-based social platform. The network-based social platform is a platform that allows the first user to communicatively couple with at least a second user with whom the first user has a pre-established relationship that is stored in a user profile of the first user at the network-based social platform. A search result including at least one item available from the network-based marketplace is provided to the interface associated with the first user. A selection is received from the first user to share information concerning an item from the search result to at least the second user, and the information is shared with at least the second user.

abstract.p: A system and method for sharing information on a network-based social platform is provided. An indication is received from a first user to share information on a network-based social platform. The network-based social platform is a platform that allows the first user to communicative couple with at least a second user with whom the first user has a pre-established relationship that is stored in a user profile of the first user at the network-based social platform. The information is information regarding an item offered for sale on a marketplace of the network-based social platform. Profile information of the at least second user is reviewed. A determination of whether to forward the information regarding the item to the at least second user based on the profile information is performed. The information regarding the item based on the determining is then shared based on the determination.

An indication is received from a first user to share information on a network-based social platform. The network-based social platform is a platform that allows the first user to communicative couple with at least a second user with whom the first user has a pre-established relationship that is stored in a user profile of the first user at the network-based social platform. The information is information regarding an item offered for sale on a marketplace of the network-based social platform. Profile information of the at least second user is reviewed. A determination of whether to forward the information regarding the item to the at least second user based on the profile information is performed. The information regarding the item based on the determining is then shared based on the determination.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: VIEWING SHOPPING INFORMATION ON A NETWORK BASED SOCIAL PLATFORM

abstract.p: A system for viewing shopping information on a social networking platform is disclosed. At the social networking platform, the system receives a request from a user device corresponding to a first user of the social networking platform to view a list of a second user of the social networking platform. The list may include items offered for transaction on a network-based commerce server. In response to receiving the request from the user device, the system forwards the request to the network-based commerce server, and then receives updated information for at least one item on the list from the network-based commerce server. Then, the system communicates the updated information received from the network-based commerce server to the user device.

abstract.p: A system for viewing shopping information on a social networking platform is disclosed. At the social networking platform, the system receives a request from a user device corresponding to a first user of the social networking platform to view a list of a second user of the social networking platform. The list may include items offered for transaction on a network-based commerce server. In response to receiving the request from the user device, the system forwards the request to the network-based commerce server, and then receives updated information for at least one item on the list from the network-based commerce server. Then, the system communicates the updated information received from the network-based commerce server to the user device.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHODS AND SYSTEMS TO FACILITATE A PURCHASE OF AN ITEM ON A NETWORK-BASED MARKETPLACE

nplcit.text: Doing it for yourself: Dance Music Summit focuses on independence, self-reliance for artists, labels.(BeatBox)Mason, KerriBillboard , v 117 , n 42 , p 40(2)Oct 15 , 2005

abstract.p: A method and system to facilitate a purchase of an item on a network-based marketplace. The system receives a request from a first user on a network-based social platform. The request identifies a virtual gift. Next, the system associates the virtual gift to an item for sale on the network-based marketplace. Finally, the system communicates interface information that enables the first user to purchase the item on the network-based marketplace.

abstract.p: A method and system to the generation of a virtual gift on a network-based marketplace platform. The network-based marketplace platform receives a request from a second user. The request identifies an item that is published on a user interface that is hosted by the network-based marketplace platform. The item is also offered for sale on the network-based marketplace platform. The network-based marketplace platform generates a virtual gift based on the item. The virtual gift includes an image of the item. Finally, the network-based marketplace platform communicates interface information that includes the virtual gift to a network-based social platform.

abstract.p: A method and system to the generation of a virtual gift on a network-based marketplace platform. The network-based marketplace platform receives a request from a second user. The request identifies an item that is published on a user interface that is hosted by the network-based marketplace platform. The item is also offered for sale on the network-based marketplace platform. The network-based marketplace platform generates a virtual gift based on the item. The virtual gift includes an image of the item. Finally, the network-based marketplace platform communicates interface information that includes the virtual gift to a network-based social platform.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: PROMOTING SHOPPING INFORMATION ON A NETWORK BASED SOCIAL PLATFORM

abstract.p: A system for promoting shopping information on a social networking platform. At the social networking platform, the system receives a request from a first user of the network-based social platform to request a second user of the network-based social platform to accept an agreement to facilitate promotion of an advertisement in association with the second user on the network-based social platform. The advertisement facilitates a sale of at least one item offered for sale by the first user on a network-based marketplace. Next, the system receives of an acceptance of the agreement from the second user to facilitate promotion of the advertisement in association with the second user on the network-based social platform. Finally, the system promotes the advertisement in association with the second user on the network-based social platform.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SHARING INFORMATION ON A NETWORK-BASED SOCIAL PLATFORM

abstract.p: A system and method for sharing information on a network-based social platform is provided. An indication is received from a first user to share information regarding an item on a network-based social platform. The network-based social platform is a platform that allows the first user to communicative couple with other users of the network-based social platform. Profile information of the first user is accessed. A determination of whether the first user is authorized to share the information is made. Based on the first user being authorized, an identifier for the item is added to a list of recommended items that is accessible view the network-based social platform.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHODS AND SYSTEMS TO FACILITATE A PURCHASE OF AN ITEM ON A NETWORK-BASED MARKETPLACE

abstract.p: A method and system to facilitate a purchase of an item on a network-based marketplace. The system receives a request from a first user on a network-based social platform. The request identifies a virtual gift. Next, the system associates the virtual gift to an item for sale on the network-based marketplace. Finally, the system communicates interface information that enables the first user to purchase the item on the network-based marketplace.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SHOPPING INFORMATION ON A NETWORK BASED SOCIAL PLATFORM
INFORMATIONS D'ACHAT SUR UNE PLATE-FORME SOCIALE BASÉE SUR UN RÉSEAU

abstract.p: A system to view shopping information on a social networking platform. The system includes a network-based marketplace, a communication network and a network-based social platform. The network-based social platform comprises: a communication module to receive a request from a first user to view a list associated with a second user both on the network-based social platform, the list including items offered for sale on the network-based marketplace. The network-based social platform further comprises a database and a processing module. The processing module accesses user profile information that is stored on the database to determine whether the first user is authorized to view the list associated with the second user based on the user profile information. Finally, the communication module communicates a user interface over the network, to the first user, the user interface to include at least one item from the list of items.

L'invention concerne un système de visualisation d'informations d'achat sur une plate-forme de réseau social. Le système comporte un marché basé sur un réseau, un réseau de communication et une plate-forme sociale basée sur un réseau. La plate-forme sociale basée sur un réseau comporte un module de communication pour recevoir la demande d'un premier utilisateur pour visualiser une liste associée à un second utilisateur, tous les deux membres de la plate-forme sociale basée sur un réseau
la liste comporte des articles offerts à la vente sur le marché basée sur un réseau. La plate-forme sociale basée sur un réseau comprend en outre une base de données et un module de traitement.

Le module de traitement accède à des informations de profil utilisateur stockées sur la base de données pour déterminer, à partir des informations de profil utilisateur,si le premier utilisateur est autorisé à visualiser la liste associée au secondutilisateur . Enfin, le module de communication communique au premier utilisateur une interface utilisateur sur le réseau, l'interface utilisateur devant comprendre au moins un article parmi la liste d'articles.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SHOPPING INFORMATION ON A NETWORK BASED SOCIAL PLATFORM
INFORMATIONS D'ACHAT SUR UNE PLATE-FORME SOCIALE BASÉE SUR UN RÉSEAU

abstract.p: A system-to-share shopping information on a social platform The system includes a network-based marketplace and a networkbased social platform, where the social platform comprises acommunication module, a database, and a processing module The communication module receives a request from a first user of the social platform to add an item to a list associated with a second user of the social platform The list is for watching items offered for sale on the network-based marketplace The processing module determines whether the first user is authorized to add the item to the list based on relationship information that is utilized to identify a predetermined relationship between the first user and the second user on the social platform The communication module communicates the request to the network-based marketplace to add the item to the list associated with the second user
L'invention concerne des informations d'achat d'un système de partage sur une plateforme sociale. Le système comporte un marché et une plate-forme sociale basés sur un réseau

la plate-forme sociale comporte un module de communication, une base de données et un module de traitement. Le module de communication reçoit la demande d'un premier utilisateur de la plate-forme sociale pour ajouter un article à une liste associée à un second utilisateur de la plate-forme sociale. La liste permet de suivre des articles offerts à la vente sur le marché basée sur un réseau. Le module de traitement détermine si le premier utilisateur est autorisé à ajouter l'élément à la liste à partir d'informations de rapport utilisées pour identifier un rapport prédéterminé entre le premier utilisateur et le second utilisateur sur la plate-forme sociale.
Le module de communication communique la demande au marché basé sur un réseau pour ajouter l'article à la liste associée au second utilisateur.
